title: USA Gear DualGRIP Stabilizing Digital SLR Camera Hand Strap Grip for Canon EOS Rebel T5i , T4i , T3i , T3 , T2i , 70D , 100D , 550D , 600D , 650D , 1100D , 5D Mark III , 6D & More DSLR Cameras - Includes Cleaning Kit
description: Get a GRIP On Your DSLR with the Comfortable & Secure DualGRIP!Safety and StabilityThe USA Gear DualGRIP Steady Shot wrist strap gives you piece of mind to shoot without worry. It allows you to break free from the discomfort of a neck strap and use your camera freely as it was intended. It uses quick-release Velcro on the wrist strap to prevent accidental drops and provide extra hand support, allowing you to take smoother, less blurry photos. With the added stabilization from your strap, you can easily and safely shoot above crowds or quick-moving objects.Durable ConstructionThe DuraNeoprene material stretches comfortably over your wrist and is so lightweight that you'll barely notice it! It's strong enough to support your Micro 4/3 (mirrorless) or DSLR camera without being too cumbersome. Durable hardware ensures that the DualGRIP will last through rigorous use.Easy InstallationThe DualGRIP attaches to almost any camera via the strap & tripod mount and is easily adjustable for any hand size. It even provides an additional tripod mount for connecting tripods, monopods, and other photography accessories. The strap also includes a quick-release lock so you can easily free your hand when needed, yet still hook back into the DualGRIP in seconds.Compatible With:CanonSL1 / 1D / 5D / 6D / 7D / 50D / 60D / 70D / 100D / 500D / 550D / 600D / 660D / 700D / 1000D / 1100D / T5i / T4i / T3i / T2i / T1i / T3 / XSi / XS...and many more!
